body:
Futa is LIFE 
Futa is LOVE
@a.b.c because its a lot of work just making one, and I believe the artist knows most of their fans are futanari fans or maybe they like drawing futanari more so than a normal girl idk
The real question is, "Why do you "read" futa-based doujins and ask why is there not a version without the futa?"
Why the artist don't do the same manga without futanari and with (two versions of the same manga)?
